name: Cop Car Vs City Crime Car Demolition Challenges
name_original: Cop Car Vs City Crime Car Demolition Challenges
description:
Cop Car Vs City Crime Car Demolition Challenges

Free to Play & Download on GOOGLE Play Store.

Do you think you can be driving a police car!! Make sure you don’t break the cop wegon.
It is Combination of all games like fighting, running, racing, action, adventure, terrorist game, stunt, mission, shooting games. This is a game of theft auto.
This Game is for fun Only .......
Be the best protector officer stunt driver in stunt and drift city. Choose from a wide choice of cop vehicles and drive wherever you want.
There are 50 different levels available in this game. you can change car after every 10 levels.
One of the best racing games of year 2016. Cop Car Vs City Crime Car Demolition Challenges no speed limits is full of speed and need for precision and accuracy.

Key features:-

- The best car driving physics
- Easy to use driving controls
- Cool new graphics
- Authentic lights and sounds
- Huge selection of high quality jailer vehicles
